properties.Name: VcfAssembly
properties.Description:
Breakpoint assemblies for structural variations may use an external file:

##assembly=url
The URL field specifies the location of a fasta file containing breakpoint assemblies referenced in the VCF records for structural variants via the BKPTID INFO key.

Columns.Name: ReferenceFile
Columns.Description:
The version of the VCF specification to which the file conforms.

In the flat file received this line will begin with ##reference.

Columns.Name: GeneSequencingFileFormatId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a gene sequencing file format.

Columns.Name: AssemblyUrl
Columns.Description: The URL field specifies the location of a fasta file containing breakpoint assemblies referenced in the VCF records for structural variants via the BKPTID INFO key.

Columns.Name: FileId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a file.
